penalty.name: HIPS service is not running
penalty.reason: The HIPS service state is '{0}' rather than '{1}' so the system is not protected

penalty.name: HIPS reaction is not logging for low severity
penalty.reason: The HIPS Protection policy is configured for a reaction level of {0} rather than Log (or higher) for low severity events
penalty.remediation: Change the HIPS Protection policy so low severity events are at least set to Log

penalty.name: HIPS is not enabled
penalty.reason: HIPS is not enabled in HIPS policy

penalty.name: HIPS is not enforcing
penalty.reason: HIPS is in adaptive mode (aka audit mode) and not enforcing
penalty.remediation: Disable HIPS adaptive mode (aka audit mode)

penalty.name: HIPS is outdated
penalty.reason: The version of HIPS ({0}) is not the latest recommended version ({1})
penalty.remediation: Update HIPS to the latest version

penalty.name: HIPS reaction is not prevent for high severity
penalty.reason: The HIPS Protection policy is configured for a reaction level of {0} rather than Prevent for high severity events
penalty.remediation: Change the HIPS Protection policy so high severity events are set to Prevent

penalty.name: HIPS is very outdated
penalty.reason: The version of HIPS ({0}) is older than the minimum recommended version ({1}) and is very outdated
penalty.remediation: Update HIPS to the latest version

penalty.name: HIPS reaction is not prevent for medium severity
penalty.reason: The HIPS Protection policy is configured for a reaction level of {0} rather than Prevent for medium severity events
penalty.remediation: Change the HIPS Protection policy so medium severity events are set to Prevent

penalty.name: HIPS security content is outdated
penalty.reason: The HIPS security content version ({0}) is {1} days old which is beyond the limit of {2} days
penalty.remediation: Update HIPS security content to the latest version

penalty.name: HIPS service is not automatically starting
penalty.reason: The HIPS service start mode is set to '{0}' rather than '{1}' so the system is not protected at the next boot
penalty.remediation: Change the HIPS service Startup Type to Automatic
